mapper.select:
SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, E.CHCK_PERD ||'일' AS CHCK_PERD, F_COM_CODE_TO_NM(E.FG) AS FG, C.CHCK_DT AS CHCK_DT, F_COM_CODE_TO_NM(upper(C.JUDT)) AS JUDT, C.CHCK_DETA AS CHCK_DETA, (C.CHCK_DT+E.CHCK_PERD) AS NM_CK_DT, C.INSPR FROM EQM E LEFT OUTER JOIN CHCK C ON (E.EQM_ID = C.EQM_ID)
AND TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) >= TO_DATE(#{fromCkDate})
AND TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) <= TO_DATE(#{toCkDate})
OR TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) IS NULL
ORDER BY C.CHCK_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHCK( EQM_ID, CHCK_DT, CHCK_DETA, JUDT, INSPR ) VALUES( #{eqmId}, sysdate, #{chckDeta}, #{judt}, #{inspr} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CHCK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS CHCK_DT, COUNT(EQM_ID) AS TOTAL FROM CHCK WHERE CHCK_DT = CHCK_DT AND #{fromDayCkDate} <= TO_CHAR(CHCK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND #{toDayCkDate} >= TO_CHAR(CHCK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CHCK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
